featured.text: Guests have to crawl into bed through a large porthole entrance.

definition.zh_def: 船艙或飛機的圓形窗戶，通常用於提供光線和通風。
definition.en_def: A circular window on a ship or aircraft, typically used for light and ventilation.
definition.example: The crew looked out of the porthole to see the ocean waves.
